title: Killing a disbeliever cuz she slandered Prophet ï·º? (taking law into your own hands) Assim al hakeem
transcript: a group of mobs killed a woman in nigeria because she slandered the prophet salaam or depicted him or said something bad they're sinful isn't there law in the country isn't there a muslim judge a muslim ruler how can you take the law into your own hands you're all sinful yes yes but she was a disbeliever she's a non-muslim even though this is not a jungle so you judge things by the consequences not by the process itself you
